pt.ua.gboard.basic

Class StripedGelem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.gboard.Gelem
      • pt.ua.gboard.basic.OneColorGelem
        • pt.ua.gboard.basic.StripedGelem

  • public class StripedGelem
extends OneColorGelem
    This gelem draws a vertical striped gelem.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StripedGelem(java.awt.Color color, int numStripes, double exteriorGap, double separationGap, boolean filled)
      Constructs a new StripedGelem (1x1 cells).

    • Constructor Detail

      • StripedGelem

        public StripedGelem(java.awt.Color color,
                    int numStripes,
                    double exteriorGap,
                    double separationGap,
                    boolean filled)
        Constructs a new StripedGelem (1x1 cells).

        requires: color != null
        requires: numStripes >= 1
        requires: exteriorGap >= 0.0 && exteriorGap < 100.0
        requires: separationGap >= 0.0 && separationGap < 100.0
        requires: (numStripes-1)*separationGap + 2*exteriorGap < 100.0

        Parameters:
        color - gelem's color
        numStripes - number of stripes
        exteriorGap - exterior separation for first and last stripes (in percentage of cell's height)
        separationGap - separation between stripes (in percentage of cell's height)
        filled - filled striped if true

      • StripedGelem

        public StripedGelem(java.awt.Color color,
                    int numberOfLines,
                    int numberOfColumns,
                    int numStripes,
                    double exteriorGap,
                    double separationGap,
                    boolean filled)
        Constructs a new StripedGelem.

        requires: color != null
        requires: numberOfLines >= 1 && numberOfColumns >= 1
        requires: numStripes >= 1
        requires: exteriorGap >= 0.0 && exteriorGap < 100.0
        requires: separationGap >= 0.0 && separationGap < 100.0
        requires: (numStripes-1)*separationGap + 2*exteriorGap < 100.0

        Parameters:
        color - gelem's color
        numberOfLines - number of lines
        numberOfColumns - number of columns
        numStripes - number of stripes
        exteriorGap - exterior separation for first and last stripes (in percentage of cell's height)
        separationGap - separation between stripes (in percentage of cell's height)
        filled - filled striped if true
